mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COLT_MOVIE( URL, MOVIE_CODE, REG_DT, UPT_DT ) VALUES ( #{url}, #{movieCode}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE URL = #{url}, MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}, UPT_DT = NOW()

INSERT INTO COLT_MOVIE_EVALUT( MOVIE_INFO_ID, AVG_POINT, CONTENT, COLLECT_DAY, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{movieInfoId}, #{avgPoint}, #{content}, #{collectDay}, NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MOVIE_INFO_ID = #{movieInfoId}, AVG_POINT = #{avgPoint}, CONTENT = #{content}, COLLECT_DAY = #{collectDay}

INSERT INTO COLT_MOVIE_INFO( MOVIE_CODE, TITLE, AVG_POINT, REG_DT, UPT_DT ) VALUES ( #{movieCode}, #{title}, #{avgPoint}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}, TITLE = #{title}, AVG_POINT = #{avgPoint}, UPT_DT = NOW()
